message.body: One night class in fall semester is $2,215. Two on the spring.....$7620. Then I'll have 3 in the summer. This'll be fun.
And it is very possible that taking one whole class at ccp will be less than one mothereffing credit at villanova.
ï¿¼I don't want to move haha

Dude. I'm going to have so many packages come in the mail. I bought jeans from express, bought Mike his jersey, then bought him tea, ordered Belinda something from lush, made those collage blankets for maddie and sid, and the MK bag.
I really hope they come when someone's home. I'm afraid someone's going to steal it.
I don't think anyone will take it

Okay. Haha. I called the people at Green Bay about the jersey cause I was going to be #90 but then I noticed that I never changed it and it was still at 0. Haha. The lady said if I spent $100 it'd be free shipping, which was an extra $10. The jersey was $95. She told me to get an ornament so I did. And she gave me 20% off the ornament so my grand total was less than my original total...and I got an ornament.

And I changed it to #23. I told him that mommy was playing the lottery and he had to pick a number between 1-99. He picked 23. I asked if it was his favorite number and he said no but that it was a gut feeling. I just went with it.
The ornaments name is Green Bay action pig. I can't wait to see what it looks like. I told her to give me the cheapest one. Hah.
Hahaha I hope it's a pig playing football.

Me too!!!!! She asked if I wanted to look online to see if I liked it and I was like "no that's okay...I think I'll like it based off the name!" I do think she gave me 20% because I made maddie and sid talk to her on the phone.
